articles.title: United Rugby Championship: Sharks 5-21 Edinburgh - Scottish side claim landmark win - BBC
articles.description: Returning Scotland international Blair Kinghorn crosses twice as Edinburgh subdue Sharks to earn the first United Rugby Championship win by a northern hemisphere side in South Africa.
articles.content:
Blair Kinghorn (left) and Emiliano Boffelli scored Edinburgh's tries in a memorable away victory

articles.title: Gareth Southgate says only winning the World Cup will fulfil him and his England players after Euros heartbreak - Sky Sports
articles.description: England's years of progress must come to fruition in Qatar - and boss Gareth Southgate accepts his side will be judged on whether they win the World Cup.
